name: T - Luna
_source: multi_add_portrait;Luna;Left;Emma;Right
speak;Emma; Hey Luna! How's the pegasus training going?
speak;Luna; It's tedious, but going well.{w} My sister wanted me to train with a pegasus before I try a griffin like her,{w} since pegasi are much gentler and won't try to rip your guts out.
speak;Emma; That's, er{tgm}...{tgm}definitely a perk of horses.{w} Speaking of, Luna, I wanted to get to know you a little better.
speak;Luna; Oh, well, I'd love to learn a bit about you too in return, if that's fine.
speak;Emma; Sounds liek a fair deal. So why learn how to ride a pegasus?

speak;Luna; I was actually on standard horsemanship before riding a pegasus, also like my sister.{w} I'm only 16, but until you came along,{w} I would've taken over if my sister fell in battle.{w} Pegasi can keep up with griffins much easier than a horse.
speak;Emma; Oh, well, that does make sense.

speak;Luna; If I train with this one, maybe Kate will also stop treating me like such a snowflake{tgm}...{tgm}{w} If you ask me, I don't think she's ever recovered from what happened to our village as kids.
speak;Emma; What happened, if you don't mind me asking, from your point of view?

speak;Luna; Well, my sister was on village patrol when these bandits stormed in without warning.{w} I was with my parents when a bandit rode in on horseback and dug an axe into my father.{w} Kate witnessed it from a distance and charged in on horseback to protect me,{w} while my mohter was killed trying to do so.{w} She was even hurt before grabbing me,{w} but we still managed to escape to a secret hideout we would play in when we were younger.{w} That's where the Dawn Brigade was born, and it was our primary base of operations.
speak;Emma; I suppose there isn't a nice way to spin that tale{tgm}...{tgm}{w} How did you both meet with Sarah, though?
expression;Luna;Smile
speak;Luna; Hehe, I'll keep that secret until next time.{w} That's a story I do love.
speak;Emma; Aw, no fun.
speak;Luna;Heh.
expression;Luna;NoSmile
speak;Luna; But I can tell you this: if I ever see Nolan again, he'll get what's coming to him.{w} Justice <bconvo>will</> catch up to him.
speak;Emma;Those intentions are{tgm}...{tgm}noble.
if;v('kate')
speak;Emma; This is sounding disturbingly similar to Kate's more psychotic side,{w} disguised under righteous indignation...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
else
speak;Emma; Surprisingly, Luna can get as intense as her sister, it seems...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
end
